# isStudioLightEnabled

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether a user enabled Studio Light on a device.

## Declaration

```swift
class var isStudioLightEnabled: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When the value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the system artificially lights the subject’s face to simulate the presence of a studio light near the camera.

This property is key-value observable.

## Configuring Studio Light

- **isStudioLightActive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether Studio Light is active on a device.
